tool.name: ListJobs
tool.summary: This GP tool returns the job IDs for all of the jobs matching the query. A blank query will cause all jobs to be returned. The job IDs are returned as a list of longs in a MultiValue GP output.
tool.usage: • The default Workflow Manager database must be set before running this tool.

param.name: in_table_jobsTable
param.dialogReference: The full path to the Workflow Manager table containing the job information. The underlying database must be the same as the default Workflow Manager database.
param.pythonReference: The full path to the Workflow Manager table containing the job information. The underlying database must be the same as the default Workflow Manager database.

param.name: in_string_sqlQueryFilter
param.dialogReference: The SQL query used to narrow down the selection of job IDs to be returned. A blank query will result in all job IDs being returned.
param.pythonReference: The SQL query used to narrow down the selection of job IDs to be returned. A blank query will result in all job IDs being returned.

param.name: in_string_wmxDatabaseAlias
param.dialogReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.
param.pythonReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This GP tool returns the job IDs for all of the jobs matching the query. A blank query will cause all jobs to be returned. The job IDs are returned as a list of longs in a MultiValue GP output.
